name: USStateFacts
0:
”Alexa, open U.S State Facts and tell me a fact.”
”Alexa, open U.S State Facts and tell me trivia”
”Alexa, open U.S State Facts and give me something”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: u. s. state facts
des: The U.S State Facts app will tell you about one of the 50 U.S States' capital and when that state became a part of the United States.
